summary: Build an admin UI to inspect contribution logs, including secure admin-only access, filtering, pagination, and links to related entities.
architectural_notes: Use existing admin-only API endpoint to fetch contribution logs for the admin UI.
Admin UI should restrict access to admins only (route/page guard).
Contribution logs list should support filtering (action type/date) and pagination to avoid loading all entries at once.
Each log entry should link to the related issue/comment/evidence entity.

existing_features.title: Add a dedicated Admin page section labeled "Contribution Logs" that is visible within the Admin area and uses English user-facing text.
Fetch contribution logs using the existing admin-only backend API endpoints and display them without loading all entries at once.
Render contribution log entries in a simple, scannable list format that includes: user (principal), action type, points, and timestamp.
Add filters to the Contribution Logs section for (a) action type and (b) date (range or from/to), and apply them to the displayed entries.
Add pagination controls for the contribution logs view(s) so admins can navigate through multiple pages of results, and clearly indicate what range/page is currently shown.
Link each log entry to its related issue/comment/evidence item when a reference identifier is present, and handle unknown/unlinkable references gracefully.
Ensure only administrators can access the Contribution Logs section/page by enforcing admin gating in the UI and preventing non-admin users from viewing log data.
Ensure the Contribution Logs UI is mobile responsive and matches the existing admin styling conventions (cards, spacing, typography, and states for loading/error/empty).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add admin UI section “Contribution Logs” that fetches logs from existing admin-only endpoint and displays a list with filters (action type/date), pagination, links to related items, admin-only access control, and responsive styling.

projectName: Step 7: Admin UI for inspecting contribution logs (filters, pagination, links, admin-only access)
